comment: "USA Today publishes about a dozen specialty magazines that come out annually. I've written for 4 of them, and they all pay about $1/word. Once you're "in," you'll often receive calls for pitches from editors of the various publications. Very nice to work with, minimal edits required."
levelOfReporting: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment: "I've written for several USA Today publications (under the Studio Gannett brand), including Best Years, Back-to-School, Pet Guide, and Go Escape Florida & Caribbean. The editor was easy to work with, requiring almost little to no edits. Note: these are all annual publications, not monthly."
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication
